paper.title: Clustering and Comparative Analysis on Z Scores Time Series of Public Listed Companies in Non-ferrous Metal Industry
paper.abstract: The global financial turmoil has brought grim situation to the world economy, in investment activities and corporate financial management, related early-warning indicators of financial risk become the focus of attention of the Stakeholders. This paper selects public listed companies of non-ferrous metal industry in Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Exchange as research object, to test the usefulness of Z score in Altman's Z-score predicting model, it showed that the original discriminant Value in the industry were too high; then, trying to cluster analysis based on time series of Z scores and discriminant the classification, and then testing the prediction of time series of Z score in the industry.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究Altman's Z-score模型在有色金属行业上市公司财务风险预警中的应用，并通过聚类和时间序列分析来测试其预测能力，这属于金融风险管理的范畴。
